name: Tortellini Vegetable Soup
ingredients: 1 medium onion, shopped ½ c canned crushed tomatoes
1 small zucchini, diced ½ tsp. salt
1 small carrot, peeled and diced 9 oz fresh or frozen tortellini or ravioli (Costco)
5 ½ c chicken broth 2-­‐3 tsp. fresh parsley
1 tsp. dried basil black pepper to taste
steps: Heat olive oil in large saucepan or soup pot and add onion, zucchini, and carrot. Sauté over medium heat for 8-­‐10
minutes, stirring often until the onion is soft and translucent. Add the chicken broth, basil, bay leaf, tomatoes, and salt to
the pot. Increase the heat and bring the mixture to a low boil. Add the tortellini and bring the soup back to a low boil.
Cook it for 2 minutes, then reduce the heat and let it simmer for 5-­‐6 minutes longer. Gently stir in the parsley and pepper
during the last minute or so. Makes about 5 servings.
